General.Name: Changbai Mountain Tourism Co Ltd
General.Description: Changbai Mountain Tourism Co., Ltd. operates in the tourism industry in China. It engages in the tourist passenger transportation, hotel management, travel agency management, hot spring development, scenic spot management, and other activities. The company is based in Changbai, China. Changbai Mountain Tourism Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Jilin Changbai Mountain Development and Construction (Group) Co.,Ltd.
General.Address: Changbai Mountain Conservation & Dev Zn, Changbai, China, 133613
